pullRequest.title: Unified exclusion
pullRequest.bodyText: Unified the exclusion logic and tried to make it clearer which file finder is supposed to be used. Also added some tests to demonstrate how each of the fields work.

commit.message: fix(exclusion): Fixed a bug where not all exclusion logic was identitcal. (Fixes IDETECT-1939)

nodes.bodyText: Maybe a little doc here as well as to what fullFileFinder means.
